research.title: Research
research.description: Every individual is different from each other and I aim to construct design patterns and tools that respect this individuality. My research focuses on understanding human behavior and decision-making via computational modeling to aid the designing process and make products for everyone. Common scenarios where they might be useful are education, VR/AR, and games.

games.title: Games
games.description: I view game design as shaping the player's experience and emotions through interactive storytelling, mechanics, and level design. The constant question I ask myself in the designing process is 'What does this design choice add on to the game experience?'. In my game design journey, I wish to make games that are not only fun to play but also meaningful and impactful to the players.

experience.title: Other Projects
experience.description: Additional projects that showcase my technical skills and passion for learning. These include coursework and independent explorations in deep learning, computer vision, and software development.
